mapper.insert: insert into t_app_type (type_name, description, parent, visible, order_no) values (#{typeName},#{description},#{parent},#{visible},#{orderNo})
mapper.select: select id, type_name, description, parent, visible, order_no from t_app_type where id=#{id}

select count(1) from t_app_type where 1=1
and type_name like '%${typeName}%'
